Package grid

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Tile  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cursor<T extends Tile>
    An abstract cursor implementation that is able to select things in any grid
    Direction
    A direction represents a delta vector in some dimensionality of space Directions are immutable - any alteration to a direction returns a new Direction object with the alterations.
    Grid<T extends Tile>
    A collection for arbitrarily deep nested arrays Allows for the creation of variable-depth (determined at runtime) matrices.
Author:
MPatashnik
